Attachment D NA New or Revised Waste Water Agreements 

Attachment E X Groundwater Monitoring Samples 

Attachment F **lJA** Monitoring Well Report 

Attachment G **Nl\** Owner/Operator Change Form Enclosed are the required documents to be submitted to the Regional Water Quality Control Board Central Valley Region in compliance with Order No. RS-2013-0122 Waste Discharge Requirements, General Order for Existing Milk Cow Dairies for July 1, 2025.

=== Page 3 ===

## Jacobus Degroot Dairy #1 2024 Estimated Manure And Process Wastewater/Nutrients Transferred Off-Site {Attachment C) A. Estimated Total Manure Transferred Offsite

| Total Phosphorus  Exported (lbs)**  34,745.98   | Total Potassium  Exported (lbs)**   | Total Salts   |              |
|-------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------|---------------|--------------|
| Exported (lbs)**                                |                                     |               |              |
| Total Manure  Exported (tons)*                  | Total Nitrogen  Exported (lbs)**    |               |              |
| 6,280                                           | 150,870.72                          | 126,182.78    | 5,367,340.16 |

- The Total Manure (tons) should be calculated as the sum of all manure transferred offsite as reported in all the Manure/Process Wastewater Tracking Manifests for the reporting period. 

•• Total (N, P, K, Salts) (lbs)= Sum of (N, P, K, Salts) for each manure export event based on (Manure(tons) x 2000lb/ton) x ((100-moistureo/o)/100) x (N, P, K, and Ash) Concentration(%, dry weight)/ 
100 using the samples closest in dale to the export event. 

## B. Estimated Total Process Wastewater Transferred Offsite

| Total Process  Wastewater   | Total Nitrogen   | Total Phosphorus   | Total Potassium   | Total TDS        |
|-----------------------------|------------------|--------------------|-------------------|------------------|
| Exported (gal)*             | Exported (lbs)** | Exported (lbs)**   | Exported (lbs)**  | Exported (lbs)** |

- The Total Manure (gals) should be calculated as the sum of all manure transferred offsite as reported in all the Manure/Process Wastewater Tracking Manifests for the reporting period. 

•• Total (Nitrogen, Phosphorus, Potassium, TDS) (lbs)= Sum of (Nitrogen, Phosphorus, Potassium, TDS) for each wastewater export event based on (Process Wastewater(gals) x 8.33Ib/gal) x (N03-N 
or TKN, P, K, TDS) x 10-6 using the samples closest in date to the export event.
